settings.title: Newsletter, Countdown added
settings.description: Develop the basic functions of an e-commerce store

settings.title: Megamenu featured
settings.description: Megamenu with 4 blocks are built-in, with high customization ability

settings.title: Filter function
settings.description: Powerful and fast Ajax Filter works with product cards, combined with the Price Range, helps customers easily select the desired products

settings.title: Cross-sell featured
settings.description: Show more suggestions when customers add products to the cart

settings.title: Swatch variant images
settings.description: Display product images corresponding to each product variant

settings.title: Ajax Mini Cart
settings.description: Designed with a minimalist, user-friendly and the mobile first standard, full display of important information in the customer orders

settings.title: Suggest product, display viewers
settings.description: Functions to create crowd effects, help your customers trust more when shopping

settings.title: Recently viewed function
settings.description: A smart function, designed in the form of a popup, to help your customers find products that have been viewed wherever and whenever

settings.title: Notify a soldout variant
settings.description: Notify and suggest customers leave email when the product version has sold out, helping to increase conversions, and collecting customer datas

settings.title: Product video function
settings.description: You can easily upload *.mp4 files on the store, and add each product by the metafields

settings.title: BIG UPDATE: Restructuring files and folders
settings.description: Change the organization of files in the theme to support multi-layout (header, footer,..) and multi-template (product page, collection page,..). The number of layouts and templates are unlimited
